description: Enterprise techniques used by NICECURL, ATT&CK software S1192 (v1.0)
name: NICECURL (S1192)

techniques.comment: [NICECURL](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1192) has used HTTPS for C2 communications.(Citation: Mandiant APT42-untangling)
[NICECURL](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1192) has provided an arbitrary command execution interface.(Citation: Mandiant APT42-untangling)
[NICECURL](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1192) has used HTTPS for C2 communications.(Citation: Mandiant APT42-untangling)
[NICECURL](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1192) has a function to remove artifacts.(Citation: Mandiant APT42-untangling)
[NICECURL](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1192) has the ability to download additional content onto an infected machine, e.g. by using `curl`.(Citation: Mandiant APT42-untangling)
